packs.title: Pack Management
packs.empty: You don't have any packs yet. Create one or join with a code!

create.card_description: Start managing your pets and invite your partner or friends.
create.modal_description: Give your pack a name. You can invite members later.

join.card_description: Enter the 8-character code sent by the pack leader.

invite.title: Invite to pack
invite.description: Share this code with whoever you want to invite to {name}.
invite.instructions: The invitee will need to enter this code in the "Join a pack" section.

leave.confirm_description: Are you sure you want to leave {name}? You will lose access to pets and shared data.

confirm.remove_description: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the pack?
confirm.transfer_description: Are you sure you want to transfer leadership to {name}? You will lose admin permissions.
confirm.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this pack? This action cannot be undone and all members will be removed.

toast.error_forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action
toast.error_not_found: The resource doesn't exist or has been deleted

validation.invalid_invitation_code: The invitation code is not valid

validation.user_not_member: The user is not a member of this pack
validation.admin_cannot_leave: The leader cannot leave the pack. Transfer leadership first or delete the pack.

animals.empty: You don't have any pets registered in this pack.

animals.no_packs: You need to create or join a pack first.
